summary: This document appears to be a record of a December 4, 2021 meeting between an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) and a detective, with the detective's husband also present. The meeting discusses an individual who was believed to be 18 years old when first brought to Jeffrey Epstein's house. The document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: AUSA Det.
persons.context: Participated in a meeting on December 4, 2021, regarding an individual's age when first brought to Jeffrey Epstein's house.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE' in the context of his house where an individual was brought.

events.title: Meeting between AUSA and detective
events.description: A meeting was held between an Assistant United States Attorney and a detective, with the detective's husband also present, to discuss information related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: A meeting occurred on December 4, 2021, involving an AUSA and a detective, with the detective's husband present.
The subject of the meeting included information that an individual was believed to be 18 years old when first brought to Jeffrey Epstein's house.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
